title: Elevate K-12 | SDE II - Backend | 32 LPA | July 2023
content:
**Education**: B.Tech in Computer Engineering(2020 Passout)
**Years of Experience**: 3 years
**Prior Experience**: Software Engineer at Amadeus
**Date of the Offer**: July 2023
**Company**: Elevate K-12
**Title/Level**: SDE II - Backend
**Location**: Bangalore, India
**Salary**: Rs 30,00,000
**Relocation**: NA
**Signing Bonus**: Rs 2,00,000
**Stock Bonus**: NA
**Bonus**: NA
**Total Comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock)**: ~ Rs 32,00,000
**Benefits**: Covered Medical Insurance + Wifi Reimbursement
**Other Details**: They were ready to give hike but I had concerns regarding work culture. I was given a week to accept or decline the offer.
